basic_attack.descriptionKey: Basic Attack varies based on a weapon choice.

charged_attack.descriptionKey: To perform hold the basic attack button

active_skill.descriptionKey: Active Skill varies based on a weapon choice.

passive_skill.descriptionKey: Your MC and Him each have their own Passive Skill

support_skill.descriptionKey: Click to check his Support Skill for that companion

resonance_skill.descriptionKey: Click to check specifics of Resonance Skill for that companion

ardent_oath.descriptionKey: Click to check specifics of Ardent Oath for that companion. Oath is your Ultimate Ability.

perfect_dodge.descriptionKey: You can trigger it when dodging right before the enemy attacks you. It activates Support Skill even if its cooldown is not up yet.

oath_recovery.descriptionKey: A β Protocore that speeds up your ultimate (Oath) recovery. Allows you to use your Oath twice per battle instead of once.

expedited_energy.descriptionKey: A β Protocore that speeds up your special energy (◆) recovery. The faster you regenerate it, the sooner you can use your Resonance Skill and Active Skill again.

dmg_to_weakened.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that boosts damage taken on weakened enemies, i.e. enemies with broken shields.

crit_dmg.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that increases your CRIT DMG. It multiplies your damage by the CRIT DMG percentage when you score a critical hit. It only applies when you score a critical hit, which depends on your CRIT Rate.

crit_rate.descriptionKey: A δ Protocore that increases your CRIT Rate. It shows the chance of scoring a critical hit. For example, 50% means a 1 in 2 chance to multiply your damage by your CRIT DMG.

stellactrum_match.descriptionKey: Each card has its color. On each stage there's a color requirement. When you match all colors, your Resonance Skill can destroy 2 layers of enemy shield instead of 1.

mc.descriptionKey: Main Character, in other words, You!

aoe.descriptionKey: Area of Effect: an ability that affects enemies in the radius

hunter_firearm.descriptionKey: A weapon from Standard Hunter Series.

flame_lily.descriptionKey: Artist's special ability. Different skills summon them, which activate buffs.

scarlet_shade.descriptionKey: Artist's Support Skill. It creates Flame Lilies

tinctus.descriptionKey: Fresh Paint's special ability. Inflict Tinctus to get buffs.

reprise.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's special ability. Reprise is summoned by Support Skill.

echo.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's special ability. Echo is a part of his Passive Skill.

aria.descriptionKey: Phantom Of The Siren's Support Skill.

fishtail_beacon.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It is a part of his Support Skill. Restores 2 Potential

potential.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It has 6 stacks, check them under MC's HP bar.

beacon.descriptionKey: Abysswalker's special ability. It is a part of his Passive Skill. Restores 1 Potential

burn.descriptionKey: Continuous damage status abnormality inflicted on enemies. Can be inflicted by some skills of Abysswalker and Artist.

deepsea_pursuit.descriptionKey: CRIT Rate buff that appears at full Potential stacks.

searing_slash.descriptionKey: Rafayel's special attack that is triggered at full Potential stacks.

sea_spirit.descriptionKey: God Of The Tides' special ability. Both his Passive Skill and yours can summon them. It has 3 levels.

heavenly_rain.descriptionKey: God Of The Tides' special ability. Triggers at full Faith and provides buffs.

faith.descriptionKey: God Of The Tides' special ability. It is located under MC's HP bar. Hits from you, Rafayel and Sea Spirits fill it up.

tidal_field.descriptionKey: God Of The Tides' special ability. It can be triggered by Active Skill and provides buffs when you stay inside it.

surging_tides.descriptionKey: God Of The Tides' Resonance Skill. Click to learn more.

sea_god_mark.descriptionKey: Lemurian Sea God's special ability. It recharges over time. Charged Attack can consume it to empower your attack, especially during Divine Favor.

ocean_descent.descriptionKey: Lemurian Sea God's special ability. It is located under MC's HP bar. Your attacks fill left part of it, while Rafayel's Passive Skill fills the right part.

divine_favor.descriptionKey: Lemurian Sea God's special ability. You can activate it by filling Ocean's Descent and pressing the button that appears. In that state, consuming Sea God Mark deals more damage, using Active Skill creates a Lightning Crystal on the field, dodge into it deal AoE DMG.

lightning_tide.descriptionKey: Damage explosion after triggering Lightning Crystal in Divine Favor state.

lightning_crystal.descriptionKey: Lemurian Sea God's special ability. When using Active Skill in Divine Favor a ball will appear, dodge in it to activate.

hunters_intention.descriptionKey: Hunter Sword's Passive Skill. Provides an ATK buff

gathering_stacks.descriptionKey: Hunter Claymore's special ability. On 3 stacks greatly empowers your Active Skill allowing you to skip the charge stage.
